scripts.deploy: npm run dist && npm run image && npm run lambda:update
scripts.dist: npm run test && npm run dist:clear && npm run dist:function && npm run dist:module
scripts.dist:module: cp package.json package-lock.json dist/ && cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev
scripts.docker:login: aws ecr-public get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin public.ecr.aws
scripts.image: npm run docker:login && npm run image:build && npm run image:tag && npm run image:push
